thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: India's Torrent Pharmaceuticals Gets Shareholders' Nod For Increasing Borrowing Limits

author: Reuters Editorial
title: India's Torrent Pharmaceuticals Gets Shareholders' Nod For Increasing Borrowing Limits
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Torrent Pharmaceuticals Ltd:
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD TO RAISE AUTHORSIED SHARE CAPITAL FROM 1.25 BILLION RUPEES TO 1.50 BILLION RUPEES
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR ISSUANCE OF SHARES VIA QIP FOR AMOUNT UPTO 50 BILLION RUPEES
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS’ NOD FOR INCREASING BORROWING LIMITS FROM 100 BILLION RUPEES TO 150 BILLION RUPEES
* GETS SHAREHOLDERS' NOD FOR ISSUE OF NCDS OR BONDS WORTH UP TO 125 BILLION RUPEES Source text - bit.ly/2Ffi5Xx
